title: Top Places to visit in Raipur, Chhattisgarh
content:
Raipur is a city in Raipur district in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. It is the largest city and the capital city of Chhattisgarh. It was formerly a part of Madhya Pradesh before the state of Chhattisgarh was formed on 1 November 2000.
